# Trim&dollar;
<!--
@name: Trim&dollar;
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Remove any space at the beginning or at the end of a string
## Parameters

- **string&dollar;**: The string to clean
- _position_ (optional): 1 to trim the start of the string only, 2 to trim the end only, 0 (default) to trim both
---
